profile.name: Rephy
profile.title: Spiritual Guide Rephy
profile.story: This pure and kindhearted Tamian soul guide can communicate with the dead. The Tamian race lives in harmony with nature, and they have the ability to read its flow and guide the souls of the dead. Rephy's ability as a soul guide is exceptional, even for a Tamian. He uses it to guide the souls of those who died in the forest and help them pass on, preventing them from turning evil. He is the most capable among the Tamians in discerning the paths of the stars, pacifying the souls of the dead, and properly guiding them to the afterlife.

1.name: Healing Soul
1.description: Restores HP equal to [ffc800]10%[-] of Max HP to the 4 allies with the lowest HP, and additionally restores [ffc800]108*(1+0.3Skill Level)+67.5% of Attack Power[-] HP every [64ffff]0.5 sec[-] for [64ffff]5 sec[-]. This effect cannot be dispelled.

2.name: Salvation
2.description: Removes harmful effects from all allies and increases their Magic Defense by [64ff64]50(1+0.3Skill Level)[-] for [64ffff]6 sec[-].

3.name: Soulrush
3.description: Deals [ffc800]88(1+0.3Skill Level)+55.8% of Attack Power[-] as Magic Damage to enemies within range [64ffff]10 time(s)[-], and reduces their Attack Speed by [ff6464]25%[-] for [64ffff]10 sec[-].

4.name: Spiritual Tuning
4.description: Every [64ffff]7 sec[-], restores [64ffff]1000[-] Mana and [ffc800]264(1+0.3Skill Level)+165.3% of Attack Power[-] HP to [64ffff]1 ally[-] with the lowest HP.

1.IV: Increases Mana Recovery per sec of the target by [64ff64]50[-]%.

2.IV: Increases CC Resist by [64ffff]300[-] for [64ff64]6[-] sec.

light.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, and the effect now applies to all allies.

dark.effect: Each time you heal, has a 20% chance to remove a harmful effect.
Magic Defense is additionally increased by 13%.

light.effect: Magic Damage taken by the target is increased by 25%.

dark.effect: Physical Damage taken by the target is increased by 25%.
Additionally restores 500 Mana to the 2 allies with the highest Attack.
On hit, has a 10% chance to reduce all of the target's Defense by 20% and reduce the cooldown of all your skills by 5%.

uw.name: God's Lamp, Kurulati
uw.description: Every 20 sec, puts the 2 allies with the lowest HP into Spirit Form for 5 sec. Allies in Spirit Form are immune to physical attacks, their HP cannot be reduced below 1%, and their Mana recovery per second is increased by 50%.
uw.story: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

1.name: Haven of Souls
1.description: [Healing Soul] Reduces Mana Cost by 1, and increases the target's CC ACC by 100 for the duration of skill.
1.story: An ornament that was used for the memorial ceremonies of deceased royalty in ancient times. Inside the green jewel, there's a crystallized tear of the mythical creature that leads people to death. It's used as a resting places to comfort the emptiness within souls.

2.name: Seed of Birth
2.description: Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 12%.
2.story: A collection of the energy that is created when a life is born. It's very warm and gentle, so souls like it. Rephy uses it to start a fire in a lamp to borrow the power of the souls. When a seed is put in a lamp, it shines brightly, like when the sun was first born.

3.name: Melody of Blue Star
3.description: Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 8% of DMG.
3.story:
A small music box containing the voice of Asiphia, Queen of Blue star. Rephy opens it when guiding souls.
The souls heading to the Garden of Rest receive the grace of the Blue Star by listening to the song of Asiphia recorded in the box.
When Asiphia's voice flows, twinkling like starlight, nothing dark or corrupt can come near those souls.

4.name: Blue Star Candy
4.description: [Spiritual Tuning] Increases Heal Rate by 50%. Targets have their ATK increased by 20% for 4 sec.
4.story:
A specialty of Lamp-keeper Town.
This candy that looks like a blue star is Rephy's favorite snack.
It is made from 'Jolt out of Sleep,' a blue herb that only grows in Lamp-keeper Town. Every time Rephy leaves town for journey, the village head always puts this candy in his pocket.
